solution_line_template: He dropped {dropped_cantaloupes} cantaloupes and had {remaining_cantaloupes} left over at the end of the day, so he sold {initial_cantaloupes} - {dropped_cantaloupes} - {remaining_cantaloupes} = <<{initial_cantaloupes}-{dropped_cantaloupes}-{remaining_cantaloupes}={sold_cantaloupes}>>{sold_cantaloupes} cantaloupes.

Three honeydews were rotten, and he had {remaining_honeydews} left at the end of the day, so he sold {initial_honeydews} - {rotten_honeydews} - {remaining_honeydews} = <<{initial_honeydews}-{rotten_honeydews}-{remaining_honeydews}={sold_honeydews}>>{sold_honeydews} honeydews.
He also sold {sold_honeydews} honeydews * ${price_honeydew}/honeydew = $<<{sold_honeydews}*{price_honeydew}={revenue_honeydews}>>{revenue_honeydews} in honeydews.
